name: Grove Street House
description: The PRC's Grove Street House is a program for adults with psychiatric and addiction issues. Grove Street House is an intensive, crisis stabilization residential dual diagnosis treatment facility that accepts referrals from inpatient, ADU, detox, jail setting, TAP, and 28-day recovery programs. Goals are to reduce use of emergency and inpatient treatment and stabilize clients for transition to less-intensive treatment programs.

howToGetIt: Please call PRC's main line for information regarding referral process and eligibility.
